page.title: 18SENIOR CITIZENS
page.content: {SUPERVISOR:MRS COLLINGS. THERE ARE 76 PLACES AVAILABLE (SOME VACANCIES AT THE PRESENT TIME!) LUNCH IS FROM 11.30-2.00 p.m. MONDAY TO FRIDAY. {PRIORY COURT LUNCH CLUB {COMMUNITY CENTRE {PRIORY COURT E 17 {SUPERVISOR: MRS. GOODE THERE ARE 45 PLACES AVAILABLE (SOME VACANCIES NOW!) LUNCH IS FROM 11.30 TO 2.00 p.m. MONDAY TO FRIDAY. {NICHOLSON COURT,SHELTERED HOUSING UNIT {32 FOREST ROAD, E 17 A NEW UNIT IS BEING CURRENTLY BUILT BY {CIRCLE 33}HOUSING TRUST AT THE CORNER OF PALMERSTON RD. AND ELMSDALE RD. THERE WILL BE 18 FLATLETS. {ST. MICHAEL'S SENIOR CITIZENS CIRCLE {CHURCH SOCIAL CENTRE {NORTHCOTE RD. {SECRETARY:DORIS EDWARDS (531 5753)}
